Introducing Qualys Consulting Edition.

Introducing Qualys Consulting Edition.

The power of the Enterprise TruRisk Platform for consultants, consulting firms, and MSPs.
Learn more
Manage all of your clients from a central, multi-tenant cloud platform
Avoid confusion between different clients’ scan information
Monitor remote devices with Qualys Cloud Agent
Keep track of vulnerability trending information for each network
Generate co-branded reports and assess results quickly and easily
Automate tasks with included API functionality
Keep track of vulnerability trending information for each network
Generate co-branded reports and assess results quickly and easily
Automate tasks with included API functionality
Qualys Consulting Edition is designed specifically for security service providers that cater to mid-market clients. Built on the Enterprise TruRisk Platform, this new offering enables these providers to bring instant visibility and unparalleled vulnerability detection accuracy to this traditionally overlooked segment. Whether you are a single consultant, or an organization managing the internal network security for many clients, there is a package to fit your needs.
Client focused organization
Keep track of your clients from a centralized dashboard. Scan data is associated with each client’s information and is organized methodically and clearly. No more confusion and misreporting.
Segmentation of client networks
Segment your client networks within the platform. That way, you can keep track of vulnerability trends and streamline reporting and analysis.
Reliability and accuracy
Qualys’ scans exceed Six Sigma (99.99966%) accuracy. And there is no software or hardware to install or manage.
Instant visibility
All collected data is analyzed instantly. Custom dashboards and reports are simple to create.
Scale your business and grow with Qualys.
